data.text:
#COVID19 is wiping out decades of progress made in health, education & social protection services. 

This week's @WorldBank-@IMFNews annual meetings will focus on building a resilient & inclusive recovery from the pandemic. https://t.co/sUFwPei5Fb #ResilientRecovery https://t.co/haDOV0zsfd

Amid #COVID19, attacks on health workers, stigma against #coronavirus survivors, xenophobia & discrimination are on the rise.

Drawing on 40 years of experience, @UNAIDS issued new guidance on reducing stigma during the pandemic.
https://t.co/UayjqMFgmK https://t.co/vdBdGA5jre

Somalia: More than 10% of children under the age of five suffer from malnutrition & lack access to clean water.

Read how @WFP & @UNICEF are keeping mothers & children safe from #COVID19, while also improving their nutrition.

https://t.co/TkM4KS4hQq

"Now is the time for a collective new push for peace & reconciliation."
-- @antonioguterres has appealed for a global ceasefire amid #COVID19.

Ahead of #UNDay & our 75th anniversary, join the Secretary-General's call for peace. Sign here: https://t.co/ik97kjqyAU #UN75 https://t.co/rOOgLwQtjU

It may not always make the headlines -- but the UN works all over the world to prevent conflict and keep peace & stability.

Ahead of #UNDay and as the UN turns 75, see how we make a difference in the lives of everyone, everywhere: https://t.co/Z1mKcW36cl https://t.co/SxXQWSUcMt

As the Caribbean region enters peak hurricane season, see how @UNOCHA teams are preparing on the ground & adapting to #COVID19 restriction measures for an effective emergency response. https://t.co/Rw1dA9O4iz https://t.co/CkyTfIq8Mn

For many women & girls, staying at home due to #COVID19 does not mean staying safe. 

Greater efforts are needed to build a future where girls are protected, free to exercise their rights & have equal opportunities. https://t.co/LyJOSS86Th #DayOfTheGirl https://t.co/xT11rtigB4

"I am very worried about the situation of women who can be trapped with an abuser."

In this week's episode of our Awake At Night podcast, @UNFPA's @Atayeshe speaks about the effect of #COVID19 on women's lives & the increase in domestic violence. https://t.co/9QPNDQ2B6B https://t.co/bP7N2SnQpN

"We have to believe in ourselves. We can do everything that men can do."

-- On Sunday's #DayOfTheGirl & every day, join Zahara in encouraging girls around the world to make their voices heard & shape the future they want. https://t.co/Z8ngA1M56E via @UNFPA https://t.co/ij7lhUYCLK

1,100+ businesses 💼
540+ universities 📚
450+ cities 🌇
committed to achieving net zero carbon emissions by 2050. 

Join them in the #RaceToZero - for a healthier, more inclusive & resilient zero-carbon economy.
https://t.co/QsBbgpm7C2 #ClimateAction https://t.co/Nl6oHHVOtq

The #COVID19 crisis threatens decades of progress made towards gender equality, putting more than 11 million girls at risk of not returning to school.

Sunday is the International #DayOfTheGirl. https://t.co/d566s3h0yn https://t.co/MbVQR0e97S

The climate crisis has not stopped amid #COVID19. 

People around the world are demanding that urgent #ClimateAction is included in pandemic recovery plans. 

More results from the #UN75 survey ➡️ https://t.co/W9E0NUJtzN https://t.co/1cQ5dpYFzK

Girls everywhere are already changing the world.

On Sunday's #DayOfTheGirl & every day, let’s listen to girls and follow their leadership as we reimagine an equal world for every child. https://t.co/LyJOSS86Th via @UNICEF https://t.co/IUQ6NsWQQg

🛰️🔭🚀 As #WorldSpaceWeek comes to an end, see how 
@UNOOSA continues to promote international cooperation in the peaceful uses & exploration of outer space: https://t.co/L8Xscmuuuq https://t.co/9XZnJPH1qz

The death penalty does little to serve victims or deter crime. 

170 countries have either abolished the death penalty or introduced a moratorium on its use. 

More from @UNHumanRights on Saturday's World Day Against Death Penalty: https://t.co/AtIhxoewu7 #StandUp4HumanRights https://t.co/hJoRY5y59X

Tips for good mental health:

🏋🏽 Exercise regularly
🥘 Eat healthy
😴 Get enough sleep
🍺 Limit alcohol intake
🗣 Talk about your feelings

More resources from @WHO on Saturday's #WorldMentalHealthDay. https://t.co/OnDy1tcXwe https://t.co/bGoVIlxfCa

#COVID19 has increased the demand for mental health care, yet few people around the world have access to these vital services.

On Saturday's #WorldMentalHealthDay, @WHO is calling for increased investment in mental health care. https://t.co/mutNubzc1J https://t.co/10fA9BzYBg

Migratory birds connect our world.

Support Saturday's #WorldMigratoryBirdDay by making your garden bird-friendly, learning more about birds or joining a bird conservation organization.

More: https://t.co/KYWkf7aETF https://t.co/TkHsTl2At9

"We must act together, now, to make quality mental health care available for all who need it to allow us to recover faster from the #COVID19 crisis." 

-- @antonioguterres on Saturday's #WorldMentalHealthDay. https://t.co/mutNubzc1J https://t.co/e6OdU2P2YR

The world's largest humanitarian agency working towards #ZeroHunger, @WFP, has been awarded the 2020 #NobelPeacePrize.

See how UN colleagues all over the world celebrated in this @Twitter moment: https://t.co/MQ9UGN6xHl

Close to 1 billion people worldwide have a mental disorder.
1 person dies from suicide every 40 seconds.

As #COVID19 increases demand for mental health services, @WHO is calling for investment to save lives on #WorldMentalHealthDay. https://t.co/mutNubzc1J #MoveForMentalHealth https://t.co/kViqXdC2wK

"I salute the women & men of the World Food Programme — and indeed the entire UN team — for all their efforts to advance the cause of peace & the values of the United Nations today & every day."

-- @antonioguterres congratulates @WFP on being awarded the 2020 #NobelPeacePrize. https://t.co/mvuJzF9nzh

"Women’s full, equal & meaningful participation in achieving & sustaining peace is a priority for the UN, essential for successful peacekeeping & a centerpiece in our Action for Peacekeeping initiative."

-- @antonioguterres #WPSin2020
 https://t.co/QGwLEZ8yFk

The women and men of @WFP brave danger & distance to deliver life-saving sustenance to people devastated by conflict, suffering from disaster & those uncertain about their next meal.

-- @antonioguterres on WFP's 2020 #NobelPeacePrize award. https://t.co/8mvHAEGyeW https://t.co/VzXRi1Hx2X

Masks should not be worn around your:
❌chin
❌forehead
❌eyes

✅ Masks should cover your nose & mouth. 😷

More on how to #WearAMask & help prevent the spread of #COVID19: https://t.co/doHQ5dLJ3J https://t.co/0EpZMbCBub

Amid the #COVID19 pandemic, the UN continues working around the clock and around the world to provide assistance to those most in need. 
https://t.co/9JZ6Q1eQ77

The #COVID19 pandemic has touched every aspect of our lives, testing us all.

I offer my sincere thanks to the world’s postal workers who have continued to deliver during days of trial & challenge.

--@antonioguterres on Friday's #WorldPostDay. https://t.co/xy2YnuaTfC https://t.co/3k1rGbnBuL

Want to learn how to spot and resist misinformation?

New game by @GOVUK and @Cambridge_Uni can help you understand the strategies used to create & spread misinformation, and how to tackle them. https://t.co/eUAqElklAD https://t.co/BclmdZmRmX

#COVID19 has significantly impacted global postal supply chains, hampering the delivery of essential public services.

On Friday's #WorldPostDay, @UPU_UN is calling for efforts to ensure the recovery of the postal sector amid the pandemic. https://t.co/OTTKNVl9N5 https://t.co/oBsNtA5slb

"Now is the time for a collective new push for peace & reconciliation."
-- @antonioguterres has appealed for a global ceasefire amid #COVID19.

Join the Secretary-General's call for peace & make your voice heard. Sign here: https://t.co/ik97kjI9Zu https://t.co/jrg57FnJ5R

"Humans are the most fragile thing on Earth."

#TBT to this moving conversation at last year's climate conference between @antonioguterres and @astro_luca from the @Space_Station. 

We need urgent #ClimateAction to protect our one and only planet. #WorldSpaceWeek https://t.co/BtS7ixq8wQ

Almost 2 million babies – 1 every 16 seconds – are stillborn every year, according to the first-ever UN estimates. 

The vast majority of stillbirths occur in low- & lower-middle-income countries and are due to poor health care. 

Details via @UNICEF: https://t.co/4MN29D4FPC https://t.co/iB59pqhKjs

More women in peacekeeping = more perspectives & solutions in a crisis. 

From raising awareness to supporting peace & security, women are key to @UNPeacekeeping's #COVID19 response. https://t.co/IHPy950Ab4 

https://t.co/mLm9dwI538

Breast cancer is the most common cancer among women worldwide, impacting 2.1 million women each year. 

Early detection through screening helps improve survival rates. More from @WHO during Breast Cancer Awareness Month: https://t.co/cEXwepy579 https://t.co/vb3pIj7S3F

#TBT to 1945 when the stage was set in San Francisco, California for the signing of the UN Charter.

Today, amid the #COVID19 crisis & other challenges, the global cooperation that created the UN is more important than ever. https://t.co/PhNh4SDARy #UN75 https://t.co/6Ym6P44I6t

"Only together, we can bring the benefits of space to everyone, everywhere. And we have the duty to do so."

-- @UNOOSA chief @SDiPippo_OOSA #WorldSpaceWeek https://t.co/bQikR6L6UA

"Misinformation can kill. So please, pause. 'Think before you share' needs to be your new mantra."

-- @Chequeado's @lauzommer on fighting #COVID19 misinformation in Latin America & what we can all do to help slow its spread. #TakeCareBeforeYouShare https://t.co/GqzOfWkty1 https://t.co/R2NqGS8stB

Congratulations to Emmanuelle Charpentier & Jennifer A. Doudna, who have been awarded the 2020 @NobelPrize in Chemistry!

"I urge all to speed up and scale up investment in Universal Health Coverage and in stronger health systems, starting immediately."

-- @antonioguterres https://t.co/1VLti06yBK #COVID19 https://t.co/eypC4XPDzh

Millions of people are threatened with hunger & malnutrition due to the socio-economic fallout from the #COVID19 pandemic.

See how @WFP is using rickshaws 🛺 and boats 🚣‍♂️ to help provide life-saving support to the most vulnerable families in Nigeria. https://t.co/a2dsaNXbNk https://t.co/JlfABfY5EK

Cotton takes up just 2.1% of the world’s arable land, but meets 27% of the globe's textile needs.

It also provides a reliable source of income for millions of farmers worldwide. 

More on Wednesday's #WorldCottonDay: https://t.co/sy75DZjrYh https://t.co/AxsWQa6fXr

⚛️ Women are under-represented in nuclear studies and often don't have equal access to education in science, technology, engineering & mathematics (STEM).

@IAEAorg's Marie Curie Fellowship Programme aims to help increase the number of #WomenInScience: https://t.co/pP3iZha9Cz https://t.co/RVLviWPSgK

Once #COVID19 is behind us, cities could be cleaner, safer & more sustainable, according to renowned architect Lord Norman Foster. 

Listen & find out how cities have emerged stronger from disaster in the past, and how they will likely look in the future. 
https://t.co/i4ZjLAdfOi

While the UNHQ complex in NYC remains closed to the public due to #COVID19, you can now #VisitUN from anywhere. 

Book a virtual tour with one of our multilingual tour guides here: https://t.co/kRY5hpoXqM https://t.co/2vGSbZYRur

From chatbots in Singapore to drones in Oman, countries have responded to #COVID19 with creativity & innovation. Discover some of the most remarkable apps from around the world that are helping flight the pandemic: https://t.co/dDj44KsGaE via @UNDESA https://t.co/1DqJntTo74

#VaccinesWork, are safe and help prevent millions of deaths every year. 

As we wait for a #COVID19 vaccination, see how vaccines are rigorously tested to make sure they are safe and effective for all.

More from @WHO on vaccines: https://t.co/dpZO5eJSp5 https://t.co/5tW5Mp422d

UN peacekeepers are #ServingforPeace to: 
➡️ Maintain peace & security
➡️ Protect civilians
➡️ Promote human rights 
➡️ Support elections & more.

#A4P initiative aims to strengthen @UNPeacekeeping & make operations more effective: https://t.co/qy3UiSZKHA

https://t.co/1gyEbghU7f

Around the world, champions #ForNature are helping improve our forests & the lives of people who depend on them.

Submit your nomination for @UNDESA's Forest Champion Award & help honour the heroes protecting our planet & its people: https://t.co/xpmcGTCYQH https://t.co/6o50ImN8Z9

Amid #COVID19, more than 1 million people from all over the world shared their aspirations for the future. 

Their answers showed that we are all united in our hopes & fears and there is more that unites than divides us: https://t.co/W9E0NUJtzN #UN75 https://t.co/V1SCPyHYey

Vote for your favourite from a shortlist of 70 finalists by 31 October: https://t.co/T23hgubFbq https://t.co/OsFUsQNBj5

#COVID19 has disrupted or halted critical mental health services in 93% of countries worldwide -- all while the demand for mental health support is increasing.

Latest from @WHO. https://t.co/asa84jGGfw

It's #WorldSpaceWeek! 

Find out how space brings people together and helps achieve the #GlobalGoals: https://t.co/hiFLuOJEOl https://t.co/W2BEvdFGON

From Bhutan and the Philippines, to Uganda and the United States, children are thanking teachers for helping them continue learning despite #COVID19.

Monday's is #WorldTeachersDay: https://t.co/CHKQTmufhM via @UNICEF https://t.co/RWocGcngGe

🍎 Only buy what you need
🍽 Plan meals ahead of time
❄️ Freeze leftovers

@WFP has more tips & tricks on how YOU can help prevent food waste. https://t.co/sXuAko2Hc3 #StopTheWaste https://t.co/5hdlhVy3gD

Education is 🔑 for achieving the #GlobalGoals.
Teachers are 🔑 for achieving inclusive & quality education.

Find out more on Monday's #WorldTeachersDay: https://t.co/S0yfc49J2d https://t.co/RexNLGfeUz

The urgency of improving living conditions has been intensified by #COVID19.  

Access to clean water and sanitation, along with physical distancing, are key for the pandemic response.

--@antonioguterres on Monday's #WorldHabitatDay. https://t.co/gTUZRriXoP https://t.co/lwiUJIVnIt

Do you remember your favourite teacher?

On Monday's #WorldTeachersDay, let's celebrate teachers around the world & all they do for our communities & societies, especially amid #COVID19. https://t.co/cZpBCTtxVx https://t.co/hXlE34AVfj

1.8 billion people lack adequate housing —  making it difficult to carry out physical distancing & maintain good hygiene amid #COVID19.

On Monday's #WorldHabitatDay, @UNHabitat explains why inclusive & affordable housing is key to the pandemic response. https://t.co/u49z75paTQ https://t.co/4O2pR5c8qF

Amid #COVID19, teachers have helped provide remote learning, support vulnerable children, re-open schools, and more. 

We thank them for all their hard work on Monday's #WorldTeachersDay, and every day. https://t.co/cFcUEg1ifJ via @UNESCO https://t.co/kXwHEJjegM

Even before #COVID19, conflict, insecurity, weak institutions & limited access to justice threatened the #GlobalGoals.

We cannot allow the pandemic to undermine progress in countries already experiencing hardships from war & insecurities. https://t.co/rN6pjUYgiU https://t.co/YpGKxrxzyO

"As we grapple with the effects of #COVID19, we have an opportunity to build a more equal world."

-- @antonioguterres in his annual report on the work of the UN. https://t.co/eHzHaYYfGB https://t.co/OBYyFnIT8h

This year's #NansenAward winner is Mayerlin Pérez of Colombia.

For 20+ years, she's gone to extraordinary lengths, often risking her own safety, to rescue girls & boys from sexual exploitation & trafficking. 

More on her incredible story from @refugees https://t.co/H8HkCLSk9R https://t.co/GhSvK1dBws

Most of the world’s countries are not doing enough to protect women & girls from the economic & social fallout caused by #COVID19.

Their needs are being neglected amid the pandemic, according to latest data from @UN_Women & @UNDP. https://t.co/06x8dXS2Zn

Deforestation is pushing animals and humans closer together, increasing the risk of zoonotic diseases like #COVID19 passing to people. 

We need to protect our planet to protect ourselves.

More from @UNEP: https://t.co/vgvg0Z3EbE https://t.co/dFk9vpg0hD

.@UNReliefChief coordinates humanitarian responses to crises around the 🌍 for @UNOCHA.

In new episode of Awake At Night podcast, he shares with @MelissaFleming what motivated him to devote his career to help people suffering from war, poverty & famine. https://t.co/OPcdN5J1AL https://t.co/UvJJWJWvvA

In recent times, we have seen around the world a pushback against gender equality and women’s rights.

Now is the time to push back against the pushback.

-- @antonioguterres commemorating Beijing platform for action on gender equality. https://t.co/KLPFFQyFrv https://t.co/61HtRX5pfz

The UN works for everyone, everywhere by: 
🇺🇳 preventing conflict
🇺🇳 vaccinating children
🇺🇳 protecting refugees
🇺🇳 feeding the hungry
🇺🇳 addressing the climate crisis
🇺🇳 empowering women
🇺🇳 responding to #COVID19 & so much more. 

https://t.co/IUYTNM5eVG #UN75 https://t.co/S6xt01lxy2

https://t.co/wndGFEYMFL #WPSin2020 https://t.co/EXMIwiwScR

Against all odds. 
Whatever it takes.

Religious sites are symbols of faith, tradition and history. They must be respected and preserved as places where everyone can feel safe.

Humanity is waging war on nature. 

But, nature is resilient and it can recover if we ease our relentless assault.

-- @antonioguterres called for urgent action #ForNature and the #GlobalGoals at #UNGA Summit on Biodiversity this week. https://t.co/U02I3zBU14 https://t.co/l2WibCzEBJ

Nuclear disarmament has been a priority for the UN since its founding 75 years ago.

On Friday at #UNGA, leaders from around the world joined @antonioguterres in calling for the total elimination of all nuclear weapons. https://t.co/zzcXqbyqtL https://t.co/4H1UMirzpU

The correct way to wear a mask to help stop the spread of #COVID19:
1. Wash your hands.
2. Put mask over your mouth and nose.
3. Make sure it fits tightly.
4. Don't touch the mask.

Get more Verified information: https://t.co/fIsE7lHkTF https://t.co/WzcX3jhPxM

-- @antonioguterres calls for the elimination of nuclear weapons. https://t.co/ucybeZnPFV #UNGA https://t.co/q8w4JS1Qfi
